Description_lang: Fires deadly bolts of Shadow at all members of the raid, inflicting $239216s2 Shadow damage immediately and $239216s3 Shadow damage every $239216t3 sec. for the remainder of the encounter to all players hit.If a player is standing close enough to a rift created by Tear Rift to be affected by Gravity Squeeze, the missiles from Darkness of a Thousand Souls will instead be harmlessly sucked into the rift.
